Egwuregwu
Ihe nkiri
Nke ka ewuewu
Akụkọ
Egwuregwu
Ihe nkiri
Nke ka ewuewu
Ebe foto si, PeterPsquare/Twitter
Uwa nile ekwetela na Chelsea bụ Eze bọolụ n'Iropu niile dịka ha ji otu ọkpụ goolu were merie ndị otu Manchester City n'asọmpị Champions League.
Nke a na-eme ya ugboro abụọ ndị otu Chelsea na-ebuli iko Champions League.
Ebe foto si, Getty Images
Nke a mekwara ya ugboro atọ Thomas Tuchel na-anyụ Pep Gurdiola ịkpakụ kamgbe ọ nọchịri Frank Lampard dịka onye nkuzi otu Chelsea.
Ọ bụ Kai Havertz nyere ya bụ otu goolu dịka ọ fọrọ elekere atọ ka emechie agba nke mbụ na ya bụ asọmpị.
Dịka o siri dị, ọṅụ juputara ndị nkwado Chelsea niile.
@PeterPsquare - " Kedụ ndị bụ Eze Iropu?"
@Van_Clasher kwuru sị, " Konte mụọ amụ, ụwa niile a bụrụ sọ aṅụrị. unu abọọla chi"
@Teewalayo sị, " Nke a bụ nkarị, obi dị mụtọ na m na-akwado Chelsea."
@ay_Dauda - "Ọtụtụ ndi mmadụ yi uwe ndị chelsea bịa ekpere na Mosque ụtụtụ a"
@comrade_love - "Abalị satụde gosiri na Ngolo Konte bụ dike"
@Saintcarter6 - " Chelsea nke m"
@EastonDavis8 - " Ka chi foo Chelsea, Daalụ nụ"
